textBeforeTable: Link Post   Topic   (x) Offline Well you need e-remote. The debuffing char needs to be fastest of whole team. The Debuffer, depending on element uses his/her debuff skill i.e.: slowdown for fire. Then the rest of team attacks. Rinse and repeat for next mob. The more spawns the more xp gained. In hunting grounds get around 1700xp tops for my fire. Also, once sp reaches a certain limit use soul dodge to replenish it. @aaron: Yes, I used capsules from 15r. I'm a full time university student so I can't be online much to train anymore. :P What's the debuff training method? Just like bursting? alyshaxoxx wrote: Posts: 121 Last visit: Sun, 19 Jul 2015 Registered: Feb, 2009 Conqueror aaron #24 Thu, 22 Mar 2012, 8:28pm Link Post   Topic   (x) Offline @aaron: Yes, I used capsules from 15r.
textAfterTable: Sun, 25 Mar 2012, 2:08pm #26 aldrinzordic Scout Registered: Nov, 2010 Last visit: Thu, 19 Apr 2012 Posts: 26 Hi Alysha :) conggrats! before anything else i would like to know if you can make a little guide on how to level it until 199 :o i admire your lvl :) maybe you cn start on lvl 180? :) Offline Link Post   Topic   (x) Sun, 25 Mar 2012, 9:55pm #27 3VOL King Registered: May, 2010 Last visit: Mon, 22 Jun 2015 Posts: 313 Thanks aldrinzordic! I bursted until level 180, then I attended the 15 Rounds Challenge every week. It gives you 25% a week, so you can level roughly once every 4 weeks. Simple as that. (: Offline
